title: Login button not responding
description: Customers report that the login button freezes after clicking.

title: Payment gateway timeout
description: The Stripe payment API fails after 30 seconds of inactivity.

title: Password reset email not sent
description: Users are not receiving password reset emails.

title: Dashboard shows incorrect analytics
description: Daily active users graph displays outdated data.

title: Mobile UI overflow issue
description: Sidebar overlaps content on small devices.

title: Search results not loading
description: Users get an empty screen when searching for products.

title: Inventory sync delay
description: Inventory updates take more than 5 minutes to sync.

title: File upload size error
description: Users cannot upload files above 5 MB even though the limit is 20 MB.

title: Notifications not showing
description: Notification toast does not appear after action success.

title: API throttle limit reached frequently
description: API requests hit rate limit too early during peak hours.

title: User profile image not updating
description: Profile avatars remain cached even after upload.

title: Email verification link expired
description: Verification tokens expire too quickly for some users.
